title: I cant use MB4, MB5
body:
Im using first two active items with buttons on mouse (MB4 and MB5). But after some patch between 26.4.2017 and 2.5.2017 I cant use it. Does anyone else have same problem?
Pls Riot, do something with it, I cant play anymore.

replies.body: I believe the culprit here might be updating to the creator update for Windows 10.  You may need to roll it back to get those keys working again.  Double check any keyboard/mouse software you might be using too in case it's preventing your keys from binding.  I hope that helps!
I has the same problem since patch 7.9. So it's the windows or the patch? Anyone has a solution? Thanks!

It's Window's fault not the client's. I've been having the same problem too and when I look for support they gave me these instructions:

"Open Start Menu > Type "Control Panel" and Open it > Programs and Features > 
View Installed Updates (Top Left) > Search for KB4015583 > Right Click, Uninstall."

The other problem people are having is that some people have different file names so it's not a very efficient fix. Best solution is to rollback an update I'm sure.
